message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business.  My asking price is $1200000. I'm confident this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your interest, $1000000 is unfortunately a bit too low for me at this time.  To make this work, I'm willing to come down to $1150000.  This price still reflects the significant value this product will bring to your business.  I'm confident that we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $1050000?

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  I'm happy to meet you halfway again, but I need to stay above $1100000 to make this work for me.  How about $1125000?  It's a fair compromise, and I'm confident you'll agree that this product is well worth the investment.
I understand your need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit above $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $1100000?
